verses.text: \add There is\add* \w therefore|strong="G0686"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2631"\w* to them which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, who \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* hath \w made|strong="G1659"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w free|strong="G1659"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* could not \w do|strong="G0102"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* it was \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w sending|strong="G3992"\w* his \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w likeness|strong="G3667"\w* of \w sinful|strong="G0266"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w condemned|strong="G2632"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1345"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, who \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they that \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* do \w mind|strong="G5426"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* to \w be|strong="G5427"\w* \w carnally|strong="G4561"\w* \w minded|strong="G5427"\w* \add is\add* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* to \w be|strong="G5427"\w* \w spiritually|strong="G4151"\w* \w minded|strong="G5427"\w* \add is\add* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*.

\w Because|strong="G1360"\w* the \w carnal|strong="G4561"\w* \w mind|strong="G5427"\w* \add is\add* \w enmity|strong="G2189"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G5293"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* to the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w indeed|strong="G1063"\w* can \w be|strong="G1410"\w*.

So \w then|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, if so be \w that|strong="G1512"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w dwell|strong="G3611"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*. \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \add is\add* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \add is\add* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of him that raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w dwell|strong="G3611"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, he that raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w shall|strong="G2227"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w quicken|strong="G2227"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mortal|strong="G2349"\w* \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="G1774"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w debtors|strong="G3781"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, to \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, ye \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w ye|strong="G2289"\w* through the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* do \w mortify|strong="G2289"\w* the \w deeds|strong="G4234"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, ye shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* are \w led|strong="G0071"\w* by the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w they|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2983"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w bondage|strong="G1397"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* ye have \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w adoption|strong="G5206"\w*, \w whereby|strong="G3739"\w* we \w cry|strong="G2896"\w*, \w Abba|strong="G0005"\w*, \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*.

The \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w itself|strong="G0846"\w* beareth witness \w with|strong="G4828"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w*; \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w joint-heirs|strong="G4789"\w* with \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; if so be \w that|strong="G1512"\w* we suffer \w with|strong="G4841"\w* \add him\add*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w be|strong="G4888"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* glorified \w together|strong="G4888"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w reckon|strong="G3049"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w of|strong="G2540"\w* this \w present|strong="G3568"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \add are\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* \add to be compared\add* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* which \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the earnest \w expectation|strong="G0603"\w* of the \w creature|strong="G2937"\w* waiteth \w for|strong="G0553"\w* the \w manifestation|strong="G0602"\w* of the \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w creature|strong="G2937"\w* was made \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* to \w vanity|strong="G3153"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w willingly|strong="G1635"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* by reason \w of|strong="G1223"\w* him who hath \w subjected|strong="G5293"\w* \add the same\add* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*,

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* the \w creature|strong="G2937"\w* \w itself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* shall be \w delivered|strong="G1659"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w bondage|strong="G1397"\w* of \w corruption|strong="G5356"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w* of the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w creation|strong="G2937"\w* \w groaneth|strong="G4959"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* travaileth in pain \w together|strong="G4944"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \add they\add*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, which \w have|strong="G2192"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="G0536"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w groan|strong="G4727"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, waiting \w for|strong="G0553"\w* the \w adoption|strong="G5206"\w*, \add to wit\add*, the \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* \w of|strong="G4983"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we are \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* by \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* that is \w seen|strong="G0991"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w seeth|strong="G0991"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* doth \w he|strong="G1679"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* hope \w for|strong="G1679"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* we hope \w for|strong="G1679"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* we \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \add then\add* do \w we|strong="G0553"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* wait \w for|strong="G0553"\w* \add it\add*.

\w Likewise|strong="G5615"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w helpeth|strong="G4878"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* we should pray \w for|strong="G4336"\w* \w as|strong="G2526"\w* we \w ought|strong="G1163"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w itself|strong="G0846"\w* maketh \w intercession|strong="G5241"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* with \w groanings|strong="G4726"\w* which cannot be \w uttered|strong="G0215"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he that \w searcheth|strong="G2045"\w* the \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* the \w mind|strong="G5427"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he maketh \w intercession|strong="G1793"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \add the will of\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* work \w together|strong="G4903"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* to them that \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, to them who \w are|strong="G5607"\w* the \w called|strong="G2822"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \add his\add* \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he did \w foreknow|strong="G4267"\w*, \w he|strong="G4309"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* did \w predestinate|strong="G4309"\w* \add to be\add* conformed \w to|strong="G4832"\w* the \w image|strong="G1504"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might \w be|strong="G1511"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="G4416"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he did \w predestinate|strong="G4309"\w*, \w them|strong="G5128"\w* he \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, \w them|strong="G5128"\w* \w he|strong="G1344"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*, \w them|strong="G5128"\w* \w he|strong="G1392"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w we|strong="G2046"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w say|strong="G2046"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*? \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add be\add* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \add can be\add* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*?

He \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w spared|strong="G5339"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall \w he|strong="G5483"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* freely \w give|strong="G5483"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*?

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* shall lay any thing to the \w charge|strong="G1458"\w* \w of|strong="G1588"\w* \w Godâ€™s|strong="G2316"\w* \w elect|strong="G1588"\w*? \add It is\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* that \w justifieth|strong="G1344"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* he that \w condemneth|strong="G2632"\w*? \add It is\add* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* that \w died|strong="G0599"\w*, \w yea|strong="G1161"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w*, that is \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w again|strong="G2532"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* maketh \w intercession|strong="G1793"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w separate|strong="G5563"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*? \add shall\add* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w distress|strong="G4730"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w persecution|strong="G1375"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w famine|strong="G3042"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w nakedness|strong="G1132"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w peril|strong="G2794"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*?

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w sake|strong="G1752"\w* we are \w killed|strong="G2289"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the day \w long|strong="G2250"\w*; we are \w accounted|strong="G3049"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w* for the \w slaughter|strong="G4967"\w*.

\w Nay|strong="G0235"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5125"\w* we are more than \w conquerors|strong="G5245"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* him that \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I am \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w principalities|strong="G0746"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w powers|strong="G1411"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* things \w present|strong="G1764"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* things to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*,

\w Nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w height|strong="G5313"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w depth|strong="G0899"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w creature|strong="G2937"\w*, shall be \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w separate|strong="G5563"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
